scripts.update-libs: concurrently "cd server && npm run update-libs" "cd users && npm run update-libs" "cd cloud-storage && npm run update-libs" "cd file-processor && npm run update-libs" "cd workouts && npm run update-libs"
scripts.global-install: concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd users && npm i" "cd cloud-storage && npm i" "cd file-processor && npm i" "cd workouts && npm i"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:dev" "cd users && npm run start:dev" "cd cloud-storage && npm run start:dev" "cd file-processor && npm run start:dev" "cd workouts && npm run start:dev"
